body:
I should have mentioned this in the announcement, but if you would  
like to give a talk at this year's workshop, please send an abstract  
to me and Raphaël on or before August 8th with your proposal.  At  
minimum, we need to get a title from each speaker, in order to set  
the schedule.


Thanks,
-Greg (et Raphaël)
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2008-July/005182.html).</sup>
